ACO.caption: Custom parameters
ACO.doc: This should be a valid JSON object containing the parameters your endpoint is expecting to receive.
ACO.name: params

AEH.caption: If you are uncomfortable with JSON you can add your parameters using the Key/Value input below. Please note that you cannot send nested objects or arrays using the these inputs. Please add any nested or complex parameters in the Custom parameters input above.
AEH.name: information
